thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 09 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Lida Optical & Electronic To Acquire Henan Company For About 503.1 Mln Yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lida Optical & Electronic To Acquire Henan Company For About 503.1 Mln Yuan

organizations.name: brief-lida optical & electronic to acquire henan company
reuters) - lida optical & electronic co ltd

text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Lida Optical & Electronic Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT PLANS TO ACQUIRE HENAN COMPANY AN INITIAL TRANSACTION PRICE OF 503.1 MILLION YUAN ($79.90 million)
* SAYS IT PLANS TO RAISE UP TO 350.6 MILLION YUAN IN SHARE PRIVATE PLACEMENT Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2G2kf9U Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2966 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
